name: MFMessageComposeViewControllerDelegate
desc: An interface for responding to user interactions with a message compose view controller.

items.name: func messageComposeViewController(MFMessageComposeViewController, didFinishWith: MessageComposeResult)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user finished composing the message.

items.name: enum MessageComposeResult
items.desc: These constants describe the result of the message-composition interface.
